title: Print Marks
subTitle: Black lines in the corners of the page are meant to show the cutting machine where to cut the product, when incorrectly processed, these can show up on the final product.
action: Compare the customer's photo with the cPDF associated with their order.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action:
Check on the DTP tab for 
Export: 1_CROPMARKS

question.text: Export settings on Presta request print marks?

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Create a fixed file for reprint

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The print file was exported with cropmarks while that is not required for this product. Incorrect export of this file caused the marks to be printed and thus this complaint can be logged on the artwork agent.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The crop marks appeared on your product because the file was set up with them, even though they weren’t needed for this print. To fix this, we can reprint the product with the corrected file that excludes these marks.
If a reprint isn't possible due to time constraints, would you be open to using this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Incorrect Process

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Create a fixed file for reprint

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The print file was exported with cropmarks while that is not required for this product. Incorrect export of this file caused the marks to be printed and thus this complaint can be logged on autocheck.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The crop marks appeared on your product because the file was set up with them, even though they weren’t needed for this print. To fix this, we can reprint the product with the corrected file that excludes these marks. 
If a reprint isn't possible due to time constraints, would you be open to using this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Automatic Checked Complaint Type: Crop marks, contour, template

question.text: What type of order is this?

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Choose one of the following outcomes based on customer type
Create a fixed file for reprint

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Alternative print marks were left in the design by the customer which were not caught by our agent or autocheck as they can be interpreted as design elements. This is not valid.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description:
The print marks in the design were not caught by our artwork check as these are pixelated and can be interpreted as part of the design. This means we cannot consider the complaint valid. We mention not to use marks on our product pages.However, as you're a valued customer and we understand the oversight, we're happy to reprint the order.
In case a reprint can not be used due to time restraints, we are happy to offer a partial discount.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description:
The print marks in the design were not identified by our artwork check, as they were pixelated and could be interpreted as part of the design. Therefore, we cannot consider the complaint valid. We do advise against using such marks on our product pages. 
However, as you're a valued customer and we understand the oversight, we are pleased to offer you a 10% discount or a voucher for future use.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Uploaded wrong artwork

options.action: Check with Prepress or place cPDF in template and move 3mm, then compare with customers photos.

question.text: What type of order is this?

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Choose one of the following outcomes based on customer type
Create a fixed file for reprint

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Crop marks featured in the bleed zone but were revealed on the finished product because of a cutting deviation. The deviation is within 3mm and this is within our acceptable margin. We can not validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description:
Crop marks, which featured in the bleed zone, were revealed on the finished product due to a cutting deviation. As this was not shown on the proof file we understand the surprise and want to rectify this by offering a full reprin 
However, if a reprint isn't feasible due to time constraints, we are happy to offer a partial discount.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: Crop marks, which featured in the bleed zone, were revealed on the finished product due to a cutting deviation. As this was not shown on the proof file, we understand your surprise and want to rectify this by offering a partial refund or a voucher if you are looking to use the product.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Cutting deviation

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprint with the same file

questions.title: Export setting on Presta request print marks?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Crop marks were added correctly but because of a bigger cutting deviation caused by the supplier, they appeared on the final product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The product was cut incorrectly, and we apologize for the mistake. We’d like to offer you a reprint with a corrected file to address the issue. If a reprint isn’t feasible due to time constraints, we can provide a refund for this order instead.
Please let us know how you’d like to proceed.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality wrong Complaint Type: Cutting

options.action: Check the cPDF in acrobat and look at the corners of the design and page size

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

question.text: The design implies the customer would cut the product after?

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Request a new file from Prepress

questions.title: cPDF has double set of print marks?
The design implies the customer would cut the product after?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Printed cropmarks in this case indicate a lack of attention during process as the agent should have seen and removed them. Upon seeing these cropmarks the customer will have thought it will be cut there.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We incorrectly left cropmarks on your file which were not required for this product, these should have been deleted by us. Our apologies for this oversight. I'd like to offer you a reprint with a resolved file. If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, I can offer you a refund on this order.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Incorrect Process

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Request a new file from Prepress

questions.title: cPDF has double set of print marks?
The design implies the customer would cut the product after?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Autocheck can not recognise pixelated cropmarks so if they are printed it means the customer uploaded incorrectly. Since the customer then saw the cropmarks on the proof, they will assume that is where it will be cut. So expecting a different result than printed.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We incorrectly left cropmarks on your file which were not required for this product, these should have been deleted by us. Our apologies for this oversight. I'd like to offer you a reprint with a resolved file. If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, I can offer you a refund on this order.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer Goodwill Complaint Type: Mismatch on product expectations

question.text: What type of order is this?

questions.title: cPDF has double set of print marks?
The design implies the customer would cut the product after?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Print Marks
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Select one of the following resolutions based on customer type

questions.title: cPDF has double set of print marks?
The design implies the customer would cut the product after?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer design implies they wanted the cropmarks printed, this was visible on the proof and they accepted so we can not validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a special consideration for being a first-time customer, we understand that you may not have been fully aware of our processes. As an exception, we would like to offer you a free reprint of your order. However, we kindly request that you provide us with a new design that does not include cropmarks. This gesture is intended to ensure your satisfaction and demonstrate our commitment to delivering the best possible product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: I am sorry but you uploaded cropmarks that indicated a different size which were proofed by us and accepted by you. In consideration of the inconvenience caused, we can offer you a 10% discount code that can be applied to the next order. This discount serves as a gesture of goodwill to express our commitment to customer satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded
